about.title: About <0>me</0>
about.content: Since the age of 15, I have been immersed in the world of programming, contributing to innovative projects. Currently, I am part of a dynamic team where I design and develop technological solutions. Barcelona has been my inspiration, and my full-stack approach has allowed me to tackle challenges from the user interface to server logic. I am passionate about technology, collaboration in multidisciplinary teams, and continuous professional improvement.

comunication.title: Effective communication
comunication.content: Ability to convey ideas clearly and concisely, in both English and Spanish.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.content: Experience in multidisciplinary teams, with skills in leading and collaborating.

problem_solving.title: Problem solving
problem_solving.content: Ability to identify and solve problems efficiently and effectively.

creativity.title: Creativity
creativity.content: Ability to contribute innovative ideas and creative solutions to projects.

critical_thinking.title: Critical thinking
critical_thinking.content: Ability to analyze and evaluate complex situations and make informed decisions.

avannubo.description: In my journey as a fullstack developer, I began by focusing on the development of internal applications for the company. As I gained experience, I expanded my scope to the comprehensive creation of applications for external clients. Progressively, I took on more complex roles, performing tasks that included task management, requirements gathering, and the complete development of platforms.

sosmatic.description: During my work experience, I played the role of helpdesk support, managing calls and incident reports for level 1 issues for multiple subcontracted companies. My responsibility covered over 7 services, each belonging to diverse companies. My tasks included problem resolution related to fiber optics, radio links, roaming, mobile data, service inquiries, and fixed-line telephony, among others.

freelancer.description: After immersing myself in the development field, I started my journey as a freelancer while continuing my education. I provided services to clients on the Cfx.re platform, also known as FiveM. In this context, I developed Lua scripts aimed at enhancing the gaming experience in the roleplay environment. Over time, I expanded my skills by integrating complex web interfaces synchronized with the game using jQuery and ReactJs. Simultaneously, I designed external platforms for game server management. At a certain point, I decided to make the full leap into web development, which involved closing my services as a freelancer to dedicate my time exclusively to the learning process.

smx.description: During my training in microcomputer systems and networks, I acquired specialized skills in the configuration and maintenance of systems, as well as in network management. This cycle provided me with a deep understanding of microcomputer infrastructure, from problem-solving in hardware to the implementation of network solutions.

daw.description: In my journey toward web application development, I initially embarked on a self-taught path that spanned over 2 years. During this time, I immersed myself in the independent exploration of programming languages, frameworks, and development methodologies. As I gained experience, I understood the importance of formalizing my knowledge and skills to enter the job market more solidly. It was in this context that I decided to enter the web application development cycle. My main goal was to complement my self-taught learning with a more structured and academic training.

projects.title: Featured <0>projects</0>
projects.description: My latest featured projects, for privacy reasons, I cannot show all the projects I have worked on professionally.

portal.title: Enterprise Portal
portal.description: Application for simulated management of companies and market environments in collaboration with Monlau Group.

codishare.title: Codishare
codishare.description: An open-source platform for sharing and collaborating on development projects.

stack.title: Technologies and frame<0>works</0>
stack.description: These are some of the technologies, languages, and frameworks that I have consumed the most during my years of experience.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: If you want to get in touch with me, you can fill out this form. With just 3 simple fields, I will contact you as soon as possible. In any case, I leave you other contact methods through which you can find me!

index.title: I am <0>Xavier Morell</0>, a <1>fullstack</1> developer
index.subtitle: Born and resident in Barcelona, specialized in the comprehensive development of web and mobile applications. A technology and software development enthusiast.
